original_title: Disney's Little Einsteins: Fire Truck Rocket's Blastoff
overview: Get ready for fun and adventure when you join Leo, Annie, June and Quincy as they bolt to the top of the Eiffel Tower in Paris, wisk off to an exhilarating race in Monaco and journey up the Andes Mountains using their special firefighting gadgets. Things get really heated when the team visits the island of Java and finds a rumbling volcano. It's about to blow, and they need to free a monkey stuck in a tree.
title: Disney's Little Einsteins: Fire Truck Rocket's Blastoff
